title: Build a Community Garden
description: Transform unused space into a thriving garden that feeds your neighborhood
big_idea: Transform unused space into a thriving garden that feeds your neighborhood

tasks.title: Research Local Growing Conditions
tasks.description: Study your climate zone, soil type, and what grows best in your area
tasks.evidence_prompt: Document your research findings including zone map, soil test results, and plant selection rationale

tasks.title: Design Your Garden Layout
tasks.description: Create a visual plan showing where each plant will go and why
tasks.evidence_prompt: Upload your garden design with labels and measurements

tasks.title: Get Community Buy-In
tasks.description: Present your garden plan to neighbors and recruit volunteers
tasks.evidence_prompt: Share photos or video of your presentation and list of volunteers recruited

tasks.title: Build and Plant the Garden
tasks.description: Prepare the soil, build any structures needed, and plant your garden
tasks.evidence_prompt: Document the building process with before/during/after photos

tasks.title: Research Food Security in Your Area
tasks.description: Investigate how community gardens impact local food access and nutrition
tasks.evidence_prompt: Write about food deserts, community health, and how your garden helps

tasks.title: Create a Garden Care Guide
tasks.description: Write instructions for the community to maintain the garden
tasks.evidence_prompt: Share your care guide that others can follow

tasks.title: Track Growth and Harvest Data
tasks.description: Monitor plant growth, yield, and distribution of produce
tasks.evidence_prompt: Share your data tracking spreadsheet or charts showing garden productivity

tasks.title: Host a Harvest Celebration
tasks.description: Organize a community event to celebrate your garden's first harvest
tasks.evidence_prompt: Document your event with photos and stories from attendees

metadata.location_address: Your local community center or school
